mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT M.ID AS MENU_ID , M.MENU_NAME AS MENU_NAME , M.PARENT_MENU_ID AS PARENT_MENU_ID , 1 AS `DEPTH` , M.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER , M.MENU_URL AS MENU_URL , M.ID AS GROUP_ID FROM MENU M WHERE PARENT_MENU_ID = 0 AND USAGE_STATUS = true UNION ALL SELECT M2.ID AS MENU_ID , M2.MENU_NAME AS MENU_NAME , M2.PARENT_MENU_ID AS PARENT_MENU_ID , CTE.`DEPTH` + 1 AS `DEPTH` , M2.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER , M2.MENU_URL AS MENU_URL , CTE.GROUP_ID AS GROUP_ID FROM MENU M2 INNER JOIN CTE ON M2.PARENT_MENU_ID = CTE.MENU_ID WHERE M2.USAGE_STATUS = true ) SELECT C.MENU_ID AS menuId , C.MENU_NAME AS menuName , C.PARENT_MENU_ID AS parentMenuId , C.GROUP_ID AS groupId , C.`DEPTH` AS depth , C.SORT_ORDER AS sortOrder , C.MENU_URL AS menuUrl , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MENU WHERE PARENT_MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID) AS childCount FROM CTE C ORDER BY C.GROUP_ID, C.`DEPTH`, C.SORT_ORDER, C.MENU_NAME
SELECT ID AS menuId , MENU_NAME AS menuName , PARENT_MENU_ID AS parentMenuId , IFNULL(MENU_URL, '') AS menuUrl , SORT_ORDER AS sortOrder , USAGE_STATUS AS usageStatus FROM MENU WHERE ID = #{menuId}

WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT M.ID AS MENU_ID , M.MENU_NAME AS MENU_NAME , M.PARENT_MENU_ID AS PARENT_MENU_ID , M.MENU_URL AS MENU_URL FROM MENU M WHERE M.MENU_NAME = #{menuName} AND USAGE_STATUS = true UNION ALL SELECT M2.ID AS MENU_ID , M2.MENU_NAME AS MENU_NAME , M2.PARENT_MENU_ID AS PARENT_MENU_ID , M2.MENU_URL AS MENU_URL FROM MENU M2 INNER JOIN CTE ON M2.ID = CTE.PARENT_MENU_ID WHERE M2.USAGE_STATUS = true ) SELECT C.MENU_ID AS menuId , C.MENU_NAME AS menuName , C.MENU_URL AS menuUrl FROM CTE C ORDER BY C.PARENT_MENU_ID, C.MENU_ID
